title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5116 - Marketing and Promotion Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5116 - Marketing and Promotion Program

State Regulations
§ 5116.1 - Video lottery gaming agent's marketing and promotion program
§ 5116.2 - Marketing and promotion plan
§ 5116.3 - [Repealed]
§ 5116.4 - Marketing and promotion plan implementation
§ 5116.5 - Permitted marketing and promotion expenses
§ 5116.6 - Advertising
§ 5116.7 - Complimentary services and items
§ 5116.8 - Promotions
§ 5116.9 - Player rewards club
§ 5116.10 - Non-permitted marketing and promotion expenses
§ 5116.11 - Competitive bids

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5116

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
